data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of New Taipei, Taiwan that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the state of New Taipei, Taiwan
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 133,181 believers in New Taipei to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 30 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of New Taipei.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in New Taipei, Taiwan to the gospel today.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Saaroa people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Saaroa people.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of New Taipei.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of New Taipei, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in New Taipei, Taiwan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
